chatSystemNetwork

Interface FromRemoteApp

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatNI

    public interface FromRemoteApp
    This class contains all the messages that can be received from a remote application
    Author:
    joanna

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filePartReceived(byte[] fileBytes, int idDemand, boolean isLast)
      this function is used when the chat system has received a FilePart

      this function is used when the chat system has received a FileTransfertConfirmation

      this method is used when the chat system has received a Goodbye

    • Method Detail

      • helloReceived

        void helloReceived(java.lang.String remoteUsername,
                 java.net.InetAddress remoteIP,
                 boolean isAck)
        this method is used when the chat system has received a Hello
        Parameters:
        remoteUsername - remote login
        remoteIP - remote user's IP address
        isAck - informs if the Hello is an acknowledgment or not

      • goodbyeReceived

        void goodbyeReceived(java.lang.String remoteUsername)
        this method is used when the chat system has received a Goodbye
        Parameters:
        remoteUsername - remote login

      • textReceived

        void textReceived(java.lang.String remoteUsername,
                java.lang.String text)
        this method is used when the chat system receives a text message
        Parameters:
        remoteUsername - remote login
        text - received text

      • fileTansfertDemandReceived

        void fileTansfertDemandReceived(java.lang.String remoteUsername,
                              java.lang.String fileName,
                              long fileSize,
                              int idDemand,
                              int remotePort)
        this method is used when the chat system has received a FileTransfertDemand
        Parameters:
        remoteUsername - remote login
        fileName - name of the file
        fileSize - size of the file
        idDemand - id of the demand
        remotePort - port of the server

      • fileTansfertConfirmationReceived

        void fileTansfertConfirmationReceived(java.lang.String remoteUsername,
                                    int idDemand,
                                    boolean isAccepted)
        this function is used when the chat system has received a FileTransfertConfirmation
        Parameters:
        remoteUsername - remote login
        idDemand - id of the demand
        isAccepted - informs if the file is accepted or not

      • filePartReceived

        void filePartReceived(byte[] fileBytes,
                    int idDemand,
                    boolean isLast)
        this function is used when the chat system has received a FilePart
        Parameters:
        fileBytes - byte array that represents a part of the file
        idDemand - id of the demand
        isLast - informs if the part is the last or not
